question: World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development was celebrated all over the world on __________.
explanation: 21st May is observed as the World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development all over the world. World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development was celebrated all over the world. This day provides an opportunity to improve our understanding of cultural diversity and to work for the goals of the UNESCO Convention on the Protection and Promotion of the Diversity of Cultural Expressions adopted on 20th October 2005.
